page.title: 16A PUPILS DAY IN DUSCROFT
page.content: In the morning I wake up at twenty minutes to eight and have Cornflakes for breakfast. I go upstairs clean my teeth ,go to school arriving at quarter to nine. At five past nine we have assembly followed by Maths for one hour. We have break till eleven o' clock where we play football. I have English at eleven, stop at school for lunch and then usually enjoy a nice game of cricket with my friends. After dinner we have History then a twenty minute break before we have Games. We finish school at quarter to four ,I have my tea and then go straight out to play golf, just to eight! I go to bed at quarter past nine and have a quiet read for half an hour.
